text: The father pig will drink and, when reflected in the pond: -What presence of animal! -exclamation-. What venerable beards! What more ornamental cornice! What a respectful and grave continent! And they still pretend that the lion is the king of the animals!... A horn on his back and a voice that says: -What are you murmuring there, little brother chivito? Voicing his voice, the pigeon says: - Don't worry, little brother Leonidas: you know we pigeons are very talkative. FIN
title: El chivo padre
author: Alfonso Reyes
